article_title: Cardinal Hill sold, services to remain the same
article_text: Cardinal Hill Rehabilitation Hospital has been sold to HealthSouth, a Birmingham-based company that operates rehabilitation hospitals across the country. All current rehabilitation services are to continue at Cardinal Hill.

article_summary:
Cardinal Hill Rehabilitation Hospital has been sold to HealthSouth, a Birmingham-based company that operates rehabilitation hospitals across the country.
All current rehabilitation services are to continue at Cardinal Hill.
